traits.Brute: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).
traits.Climbing: The gladiator can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
traits.Steadfast: The gladiator can't be disarmed, and cannot make ranged attacks.

actions.Multiattack: The gladiator makes three melee attacks.
actions.Spear: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands.
actions.Shield Bash: Melee Weapon Attack: +7+1d6 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15+1d6 + 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
